info.name: WAF Detection
author: dwisiswant0
lu4nx
info.description: A web application firewall was detected.

request:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: kelrisks.beta.gouv.fr
User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)
Connection: close
Content-Length: 27
Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded
Accept-Encoding: gzip

_=<script>alert(1)</script>
response:
HTTP/1.1 301 Moved Permanently Connection: close Content-Length: 162 Content-Type: text/html Date: Sun, 17 Jul 2022 05:42:22 GMT Location: https://errial.georisques.gouv.fr X-Request-Id: 93753063-04bc-477e-8d27-94445f8ea218 301 Moved Permanently

301 Moved Permanently

nginx
